meanings.definition: One who attains or achieves something.
meanings.sent1: The attainer of the award was very proud.
meanings.sent2: She worked hard to become an attainer of success.
meanings.sent3: The attainer of the last piece of cake was the happiest person in the room.
meanings.sent4: Being an attainer of knowledge is like collecting treasures for the mind.
meanings.sent5: The attainer of the highest mountain peak felt a sense of accomplishment.

meanings.definition: The act of attaining or reaching a goal.
meanings.sent1: The attainer of the finish line was exhausted but happy.
meanings.sent2: Hard work and determination are key to becoming an attainer of dreams.
meanings.sent3: The attainer of the remote control had the power to choose the channel.
meanings.sent4: Reaching the top of the ladder, he felt like an attainer of heights.
meanings.sent5: The attainer of the treasure chest found it full of surprises.
